The boundaries of these centres are shown on the Policies Map. 16.10 Town centres act as hubs for the boroughâ€™s communities and, as such, should incorporate a mixture of complementary uses. This should include housing development where appropriate. The development of housing in town centres can have a positive impact on other uses within the town centre by introducing a larger customer base for local businesses and increasing the overall vibrancy and vitality of the town centre. Town centre housing also ensures that residents are in wellconnected locations and can meet their day-to-day needs within easy walking distance from their homes. 16.11 Development within these centres will need to demonstrate how it accords with policies and guidance within the hierarchy as appropriate.
